sentences.english: O God Siva, this woman must be eliminated.
sentences.chinese: 唵，顶礼湿婆，这个女人是一定要被消灭的。

sentences.english: The hindu phallic symbol of siva .
sentences.chinese: 印度教中湿婆的生殖器的象征。

sentences.english: Apparently, Shahrukh refused to retract his statements and that has further irked Shiv Sena.
sentences.chinese: 显然，沙鲁克拒绝收回他的言论和进一步激怒湿婆军。

sentences.english: Festivalgoers leave offerings for the Hindu deity Lord Shiva.
sentences.chinese: 节日活动留下了给印度教湿婆神的供品。

sentences.english: Shiva and Shakthi are deeply in love.
sentences.chinese: 湿婆神和沙克蒂深深相爱。

sentences.english: The whole world and everything in it appeared as the Lila, the sport, of Siva and Sakti.
sentences.chinese: 整个世界和每件事物都是湿婆和萨缇的运动。

sentences.english: He looked the living image of siva .
sentences.chinese: 他看上去像活生生的湿婆。

sentences.english: The traditional festival involves exhuming body parts and carrying them in a procession to appease Lord Shiva.
sentences.chinese: 传统节日涉及掘出肢体和执行他们在游行安抚湿婆神。

sentences.english: A Siva Linga stands amid the ornate walls of the Angkor Wat temple in Cambodia.
sentences.chinese: 神石湿婆林伽竖立在柬埔寨吴哥寺华美的围墙之间。

sentences.english: All men are Shiva and all women are Shakthi.
sentences.chinese: 所有的男人都是湿婆神，女人都是沙克蒂。

sentences.english: She is the consort of Shiva.
The river was said to have been entangled in Lord Shiva's locks, to save the earth from destruction.
sentences.chinese: 恒河被缠绕在湿婆神的锁扣上，以防损坏大地。

sentences.english: It is interesting to note, that Siva spelled backwards is Avis .
sentences.chinese: 有趣的是，请注意，湿婆拼写倒退，是使用条款。

sentences.english: But you may live in Benares , which belongs to iva.
sentences.chinese: 但是，你可以住在贝拿勒斯，那是属于湿婆的所在地。

sentences.english: The people felt blessed as by a vision of Siva Himself.
sentences.chinese: 人们感觉到受到湿婆本人的祝福。

sentences.english: Siva, Her mighty Husband, who wields the fearful trident.
sentences.chinese: 湿婆，她强而有力的丈夫，挥舞着可怕的三叉戟。

definition: Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
Hanuman, a monkey God in the Indian epic Ramayana
Poseidon, God of the sea in Greek mythology
